name: 09.02-Deeptools: bamCompare
description: Can be used to generate a bigWig or bedGraph file based on two BAM files that are compared to each other while being simultaneously normalized for sequencing depth

parameters.name: BAM file 1
parameters.description: Sorted BAM file 1. Usually the BAM file for the treatment. (default: None)

parameters.name: BAM file 2
parameters.description: Sorted BAM file 2. Usually the BAM file for the treatment. (default: None)

parameters.name: Output type
parameters.description: Output file type. Either 'bigwig' or 'bedgraph. default: bigwig)
